name: Altan
aura: Increases Ally DEF in All Battles by 33%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Searing Blow
skills.books:

Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 20% of their MAX HP if this attack kills an enemy.
skills.name: Wall of Flame
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Revives a random ally with 30% HP every time this Champion kills an enemy. Resets the cooldowns on this Champion's Skills if this Champion kills an enemy and all allies are alive.
skills.name: Fiery Rebirth [Passive]
